body: expecting some ntr, get rickrolled instead
Wow this was way more wholesome than expected I actually cried

What I really don't get is why tf would the husband give the MC that smirk multiple times basically saying "She's mine. You'll never touch her" when he never wanted to be in the marriage in the first place. He only did it because his family approved her. Art is great but the story is just meh
i cries a little

Let me rape this woman constantly, she'll definitely fall in love with me.

This story isn't good, but the art is nice I guess
Nice ending
this is Netori since the ML is romantically interested in the FL
So I guess we just throw ntr wherever the cheating tag is now?
I don't think I can consider this an NTR since the FL is on bad terms with the her husband. I can only consider this as cheating.
Wow, that story is actually really good!

i love the story line , i hope the author had good illustator for help him.
i know this NTR is not good for  NTR lovers but for normal people this NTR really good , no matter how you create this storyline i still keep on fire.
Very original and didn't feel bad at all 😊😊

Story feels rushed and a little forced in some ways, artworks aren't as good as Kemonono usual standard, but at least it's not another generic braindead NTR.
Damn, I wish more artists did more works like this one rather than copypasting each other.
Amazing piece of shit men keep up the good work
Mhm quite good yes
Story would make much more smooth if she cause her husband cheating first...
Story too forceful and silver spoon feed but at least is better than typical NTR trash out there.

Bless the ending. This didn't feel like netorare because the husband didn't even want her. If anything, it felt like the woman getting NTR'd because she was attached to her husband while he loved somebody else. This whole story read like an otome romance plot and I greatly enjoyed the soapy goodness! I wonder if the artist is female.

I didn't like much about Shun but alright, story felt kinda forceful at times, art was passable (at least colorized), and we got a, I think, forced happy ending (actually not the "realistic" ending I was hoping for before she went back to check the old house). Popular? I don't think so, but if that's the case, I'll take a cucumber and slap my ass with it.
Ending was meh
fuckkkkk yesssss now that what I called an ending god damn author sure did well
Scratch that.  I'm not sure if this will be popular or not because it's Hella long.
Yep this is gonna be popular
I'm still waiting for the NTR to appear, where the wife and lover are forced to suffer for treason to her husband.
Is this the fabled wholesome ntr?
